  • 9:00AM

    Registration & Breakfast

    Chillwave readymade gluten-free, pour-over +1 Thundercats iPhone Vice mumblecore vegan Bushwick. 90's Schlitz DIY Austin.

  • 9:50AM

    Welcome

  • 10.00AM - 10.45AM

    Building applications with a hammerby Krešimir Antolić

    This talk will cover the goods and the bads of choosing javascript as a solution for everything. Let us start by quoting Atwood's Law: “any application that can be written in JavaScript, will eventually be written in JavaScript”. And so it came to be - you either love it or hate it but JavaScript became the “all solving hammer”.

  • 10.45AM - 11.30AM

    Supercharge your development environment using Dockerby Deni Bertović

    The idea of this talk is to convey how important it is that we have our development environment as close to production as possible. These days applications are getting more and more complex. It's becoming quite difficult to keep track of all the different components an application needs to function (a database, an AMQP, a web server, a document store...).

  • 11:30AM

    Coffee/lunch break
